main event: An object the size of a head of a pin, bright white, was observed making a sudden 90-degree turn and disappearing quickly while moving north.
interesting points: The observation lasted for one minute,The object's course was initially west and north,The object appeared to exhibit abrupt right-angle turns,It was reported by a reliable drill rig operator considered knowledgeable,Preliminary analysis found no probable cause for the sighting.
location: 4.4 miles NNW of San Antonio, Texas, USA
witness description: drill rig operator in a rock quarry, considered reliable
